function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban areas due to high density and travel","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Implement policies and practices to reduce crowding, improve ventilation, and promote hygiene","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for crowd monitoring and management, air quality sensors, and contactless infrastructure","People":"Residents, commuters, and travelers in urban areas","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential impact of pandemic diseases on urban planning and design","Impact":"Unplanned urban growth, inadequate infrastructure, and public health risks in response to pandemics","Mitigation":"Integrate public health considerations into urban planning, improve infrastructure resilience, and promote community engagement","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban modeling and simulation, and participatory design tools","People":"City planners, architects, and public health officials","Owner":"City governments, urban development agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Discrepancies in disease spread based on health and urban space quality levels","Impact":"Unequal distribution of disease impact and vulnerabilities between cities in the Global North and South","Mitigation":"Addressing inequalities in access to healthcare, improving social infrastructure, and promoting sustainable urban development","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health platforms, and urban resilience technologies","People":"Residents in cities with varying health and urban space quality levels","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, city authorities, and community organizations"}]}
